channel.title: Erm
channel.description: i followed the shops tut and i did everything and its fine but. i dont know how to place the shop npc where i want it![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2007, 02:39:23 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Erm
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

[quote=“glabay, post:4, topic:167286”][quote author=barrage time link=topic=226678.msg1949609#msg1949609 date=1198460961]
Go into autospawn.cfg and dot he following;

spawn = [NPC ID]	[x cord]	[y cord]	0	0	0	0	0	2	fishing shop in cammy

And leave the rest unless you want that ahop npc to move around.
[/quote]

thats the same thing i just said only i told him when ea number would mean[/quote]
Obviously we posted at the same time, dont make a big thing out of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Erm
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

open config look for autospawn

spawn = [id]-tab-[x coord]-tab-[ycoord]-tab-[hight]-tab-[rangexcoord]-tab-[rangeycoord]-tab-[rangexcoord]-tab-[rangeycoord]-tab-[walkstyle]

Read full topic
